org.apache.flink.graph.library.linkanalysis

类 PageRank<K,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingBase<K,VV,EV,DataSet<T>>
      • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,PageRank.Result<K>>
        • org.apache.flink.graph.library.linkanalysis.PageRank<K,VV,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,DataSet<PageRank.Result<K>>>

    public class PageRank<K,VV,EV>
extends GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,PageRank.Result<K>>
    PageRank computes a per-vertex score which is the sum of PageRank scores transmitted over in-edges. Each vertex's score is divided evenly among out-edges. High-scoring vertices are linked to by other high-scoring vertices; this is similar to the 'authority' score in HITS.

    See http://ilpubs.stanford.edu:8090/422/1/1999-66.pdf

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  PageRank.AdjustScores<T>
      Each iteration the per-vertex scores are adjusted with the damping factor.
      private static class  PageRank.ChangeInScores<T>
      Computes the sum of the absolute change in vertex PageRank scores between iterations.
      private static class  PageRank.ExtractSourceDegree<T,ET>
      Remove the unused original edge value and extract the out-degree.
      private static class  PageRank.InitializeSourceVertices<T>
      Source vertices have no in-edges so have a projected score of 0.0.
      private static class  PageRank.InitializeVertexScores<T>
      PageRank scores sum to 1.0 so initialize each vertex with the inverse of the number of vertices.
      static class  PageRank.Result<T>
      A result for the PageRank algorithm.
      private static class  PageRank.ScoreConvergence
      Monitors the sum of the absolute change in vertex scores.
      private static class  PageRank.SendScore<T>
      The PageRank score for each vertex is divided evenly and projected to neighbors on out-edges.
      private static class  PageRank.SumVertexScores<T>
      Sum the PageRank score over all vertices.
      private static class  PageRank.TranslateResult<T>
      Map the Tuple result to the return type.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PageRank

        public PageRank(double dampingFactor,
                int iterations)
        PageRank with a fixed number of iterations.
        参数:
        dampingFactor - probability of following an out-link, otherwise jump to a random vertex
        iterations - fixed number of iterations

      • PageRank

        public PageRank(double dampingFactor,
                double convergenceThreshold)
        PageRank with a convergence threshold. The algorithm terminates when the change in score over all vertices falls to or below the given threshold value.
        参数:
        dampingFactor - probability of following an out-link, otherwise jump to a random vertex
        convergenceThreshold - convergence threshold for sum of scores

      • PageRank

        public PageRank(double dampingFactor,
                int maxIterations,
                double convergenceThreshold)
        PageRank with a convergence threshold and a maximum iteration count. The algorithm terminates after either the given number of iterations or when the change in score over all vertices falls to or below the given threshold value.
        参数:
        dampingFactor - probability of following an out-link, otherwise jump to a random vertex
        maxIterations - maximum number of iterations
        convergenceThreshold - convergence threshold for sum of scores

    • 方法详细资料

      • setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices

        public PageRank<K,VV,EV> setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices(boolean includeZeroDegreeVertices)
        This PageRank implementation properly handles both source and sink vertices which have, respectively, only outgoing and incoming edges.

        Setting this flag includes "zero-degree" vertices in the PageRank computation and result. These vertices are handled the same as other "source" vertices (with a consistent score of (1 - damping factor) / number of vertices) but only affect the scores of other vertices indirectly through the taking of this proportional portion of the "random jump" score.

        The cost to include zero-degree vertices is a reduce for uniqueness on the vertex set followed by an outer join on the vertex degree DataSet.

        参数:
        includeZeroDegreeVertices - whether to include zero-degree vertices in the iterative computation
        返回:
        this
